name: Easy White Cheese & Garlic Pizzas
description: Extra cheese and extra garlic? Yes, please! No red sauce is needed for these mouthwatering naan pizzas. The recipe is a Yummly original created by [Sara Mellas](https://www.yummly.com/dish/author/Sara%20Mellas).
recipeIngredient: 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese or shredded pizza blend cheese, 1 cup is 4 oz.
4 ounces ricotta cheese 4 oz. is 1 scant cup
2 tablespoons shaved Parmesan cheese for serving

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2: Line a baking sheet…
recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3: Arrange the naan on…
recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the naan on the baking sheet. Drizzle an equal amount of olive oil over the surface of each piece.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 5: Sprinkle the naan p…
recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the naan pizzas with the minced garlic. Sprinkle the shredded cheese over each naan piece. Drop small amounts of ricotta cheese equally over them. Sprinkle each pizza with Italian seasoning.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 6: Bake the pizzas on…
recipeInstructions.text: Bake the pizzas on middle rack of oven until naan is crisp and cheese is bubbly and golden, 12-15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 7: Check to see that p…
recipeInstructions.text: Check to see that pizzas are done. Remove from oven or add time as needed.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 8: Allow pizzas to coo…
recipeInstructions.text: Allow pizzas to cool on baking sheet for 2-3 minutes. Top with basil ribbons and a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese, if desired, then slice and serve. Refrigerate leftovers in an airtight container for up to 2 days. Reheat in the oven at 350°F for 5-7 minutes.
